thread.title: MLive Media Group newspapers are finalists for 52 awards in 2016 Michigan AP contest
thread.title_full: MLive Media Group newspapers are finalists for 52 awards in 2016 Michigan AP contest

author: Rosemary Parker | rparker3@mlive.com
title: MLive Media Group newspapers are finalists for 52 awards in 2016 Michigan AP contest
text: MLive's awards span all categories: Public service, headline writing and page design, investigative and enterprise reporting, and sports reporting, photography and breaking news.
